  • Constructor Details

    • RisikoGame

      public RisikoGame​(Player[] players, String terrFile, String continentsFile, String missionsFile) throws NumberFormatException, IOException
      Creates and initializes a RisikoGame
      Parameters:
      players - are the players of the game //sto attento che nella classe playerList ho messou un ArrayList, decido se passare ad Array normale
      terrFile - is the file containing the territories
      continentsFile - is the file containing the continents
      missionsFile - is the file containing the missions
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - if there are problems with the parsing
      IOException - if there is a problem with the file
